SELECT rn, mno, mname, mtel, gprno, maxerdate, prturn, prcount, prcountall FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, mno, mname, mtel, gprno, maxerdate, prturn, prcount, prcountall FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m.mno mno, m.mname mname, m.mtel mtel, gprno, maxerdate, pr.prturn prturn, pr.prcount prcount, pr.prcountall prcountall FROM member m JOIN ptrecord pr ON m.mno = pr.mno JOIN exerciserecord er ON pr.prno = er.prno RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT prno gprno, MAX(erdate) maxerdate FROM exerciserecord GROUP BY prno ) gr ON er.erdate = gr.maxerdate WHERE pr.tno = 1 ) WHERE
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} ORDER BY rn DESC

SELECT rownum rn, mno, mname, edate, erdate, prno, prcount FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m.mno mno, m.mname mname, TO_DATE(er.edate, 'yy/mm/dd') edate, TO_DATE(er.erdate, 'yy/mm/dd') erdate, pr.prno prno, pr.prcount prcount FROM member m, ptrecord pr, exerciserecord er WHERE m.mno = pr.mno AND pr.prno = er.prno AND er.prno = #{prno} AND pr.tno = #{tno} ) ORDER BY rn DESC
SELECT DISTINCT m.mno mno, m.mname mname, pr.prno prno, pr.tno tno FROM member m, ptrecord pr, exerciserecord er WHERE m.mno = pr.mno AND pr.prno = er.prno AND er.prno = #{prno} AND pr.tno = #{tno}

SELECT m.mname mname, m.mno mno, er.ergroup ergroup, er.erno erno, er.eno eno, er.edate edate, er.erset erset, er.erweight erweight, er.ernumber ernumber, er.erdate erdate, er.prno prno, et.ename ename, er.ermemo ermemo FROM member m, ptrecord pr, exerciserecord er, exercisetype et WHERE m.mno = pr.mno AND pr.prno = er.prno AND er.eno = et.eno AND er.prno = #{prno} AND TO_DATE(er.edate, 'yy/mm/dd') = TO_DATE(#{edate}, 'yy/mm/dd') AND pr.tno = #{tno} ORDER BY ergroup, erset
mapper.update: UPDATE exerciserecord SET eno = #{eno}, edate = #{edate}, erset = #{erset}, erweight = #{erweight}, ernumber = #{ernumber}, erdate = sysdate, ermemo = #{ermemo} WHERE erno = #{erno}
UPDATE ptrecord SET prcount = ( SELECT COUNT(edate) FROM( SELECT DISTINCT TO_DATE(edate, 'yy/mm/dd') edate FROM exerciserecord WHERE prno = #{prno} ) ) WHERE prno = #{prno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM exerciserecord WHERE prno = #{prno} AND TO_DATE(edate, 'yy/mm/dd') = TO_DATE(#{edate}, 'yy/mm/dd')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(edate) FROM( SELECT DISTINCT edate FROM exerciserecord WHERE prno = #{prno} )
SELECT COUNT(prturn) FROM ptrecord WHERE prno > 0
